Description: · Develop document inventories and maintain indexes for classification systems.· Fully responsible for maintaining documents / letters / email on electronic storage including dispatach / upload / download & distribution.· Ensure compliance with the project’s electronic filing / documentation system.· Responsible for keeping comprehensive records of all documents being issued and received, including revision status, commented status open/closed status.· Attaching and issuing documents under transmittals· Action internal / external correspondence and archive as required· Prepare schedules, record activities and create follow-up / action lists and remind / execute as appropriate.· Maintain “Strictly Confidential” files.· Liaise with internal stakeholders for normal functioning of the department.Skills
